template.name: cdach_header_DocumentCode
template.desc: A LOINC based document type of a CDA document instance including a translation to the Swiss EPR XDS.b metadata. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST specialise this template by precising the exact value of @code and its translation to the Swiss EPR XDS.b metadata.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentConfidentialityCode
template.desc:
A confidentiality level of a CDA document instance according to the Swiss EPR regulation. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.
Language dependent references to the Swiss EPR regulation:
en: Federal Act on the Electronic Patient Record (EPRA), FDHA Ordinance on the Electronic Patient Record (EPRO-FDHA), Appendix 3 (Metadata)
de: Bundesgesetz über das elektronische Patientendossier (EPDG), Verordnung des EDI über das elektronische Patientendossier (EPDV-EDI), Anhang 3 (Metadaten)
fr: Loi fédérale sur le dossier électronique du patient (LDEP), Ordonnance du DFI sur le dossier électronique du patient (ODEP-DFI), Annexe 3 (Métadonnées)
it: Legge federale sulla cartella informatizzata del paziente (LCIP), Ordinanza del DFI sulla cartella informatizzata del paziente (OCIP-DFI), Allegato 3 (Metadati)

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentId
template.desc: A unique identifier for each CDA document instance. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentLanguage
template.desc: The RFC 1766 (ISO-639-1 and ISO 3166) based language in which the narrative texts in this CDA document instance are written. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentRealm
template.desc: Swiss Realm (CHE) of HL7 CDA. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_other_AddressInformationCompilation-eCH-0010
template.desc:
Address information according to the eCH-0010 V7.0 addressInformation data type. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.
See https://www.ech.ch/vechweb/page?p=dossier&documentNumber=eCH-0010&documentVersion=7.0 for more information.

template.name: cdach_other_AssignedEntityCompilationGlnName
template.displayName: Assigned Entity Compilation with GLN and name
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an assigned entity with a required GLN is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_AssignedEntityCompilationGlnNameAddrTelecomPersonOrganization
template.displayName: Assigned Entity Compilation with GLN, name, addr, telecom, person and organization
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an assigned entity with required GLN, name, addr, telecom, person and organization (also with GLN) are used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_AssignedEntityCompilationId
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an assigned entity with a required id is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_AssignedEntityCompilationIdNameAddrTelecomPersonOrganization
template.displayName: Assigned Entity Compilation with id, name, addr, telecom, person and organization
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an assigned entity with required id, name, addr, telecom, person and organization are used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_AssignedEntityCompilationNameAddrTelecom
template.displayName: Assigned Entity Compilation with name, addr and telecom
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an assigned entity with required name, addr and telecom is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_AuthorCompilationWithName
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an author with required name is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_AuthorCompilationWithNameAddrTelecom
template.displayName: Author Compilation with name, addr and telecom
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an author with required name, addr and telecom is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_DeviceCompilationWithName
template.desc:
Reusable template wherever a device with required name is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.
A device is either a physical device (e.g. analyzer with which laboratory results are determined) or a software (e.g. laboratory information system, in which laboratory results are documented).

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentCode
template.desc: A LOINC based document type of a CDA document instance including a translation to the Swiss EPR XDS.b metadata. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST specialise this template by precising the exact value of @code and its translation to the Swiss EPR XDS.b metadata.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentConfidentialityCode
template.desc:
A confidentiality level of a CDA document instance according to the Swiss EPR regulation. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.
Language dependent references to the Swiss EPR regulation:
en: Federal Act on the Electronic Patient Record (EPRA), FDHA Ordinance on the Electronic Patient Record (EPRO-FDHA), Appendix 3 (Metadata)
de: Bundesgesetz über das elektronische Patientendossier (EPDG), Verordnung des EDI über das elektronische Patientendossier (EPDV-EDI), Anhang 3 (Metadaten)
fr: Loi fédérale sur le dossier électronique du patient (LDEP), Ordonnance du DFI sur le dossier électronique du patient (ODEP-DFI), Annexe 3 (Métadonnées)
it: Legge federale sulla cartella informatizzata del paziente (LCIP), Ordinanza del DFI sulla cartella informatizzata del paziente (OCIP-DFI), Allegato 3 (Metadati)

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentId
template.desc: A unique identifier for each CDA document instance. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentLanguage
template.desc: The RFC 1766 (ISO-639-1 and ISO 3166) based language in which the narrative texts in this CDA document instance are written. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentRealm
template.desc: Swiss Realm (CHE) of HL7 CDA. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentReplacement
template.desc: Relationship to another CDA-CH V2 based document that is replaced by the current one. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentReplacement
template.desc: Relationship to another CDA-CH V2 based document that is replaced by the current one. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentSetIdAndVersionNumber
template.displayName: Document Set Id and Version Number
template.desc: Unity of document versions. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MUST reference this template.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentTemplateIdsCdaChv2.0-nonXmlBody
template.displayName: Document Template Ids CDA-CH v2.0 - nonXMLBody
template.desc: CDA-CH V2 bases on HL7 CDA R2 (2005) and - by using this template - require a non XML body for specific, not further described use cases. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats SHOULDN'T use this template, as they better refer to the document level template requiring a structured body. These SHALL define further template ids in their own separate templates.

template.name: cdach_header_DocumentTemplateIdsCdaChv2.0-structuredBody
template.displayName: Document Template Ids CDA-CH v2.0 - structuredBody
template.desc: CDA-CH V2 bases on HL7 CDA R2 (2005) and - by using this template - require a structured body. All CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats SHALL reference this template. These SHALL define further template ids in their own separate templates.

template.name: cdach_other_OrganizationCompilationGlnName
template.displayName: Organization Compilation with GLN and name
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an organization with required GLN as id and name is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_OrganizationCompilationGlnNameAddrTelecom
template.displayName: Organization Compilation with GLN, name, addr and telecom
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an organization with required GLN as id, name, address and communication means is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_OrganizationCompilationIdNameAddrTelecom
template.displayName: Organization Compilation with id, name, addr and telecom
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an organization with required id, name, address and communication means is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_OrganizationCompilationWithName
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an organization with required name is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_OrganizationCompilationWithNameAddrTelecom
template.displayName: Organization Compilation with name, addr, telecom
template.desc: Reusable template wherever an organization with required name, address and communication means is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_OriginalTextElementWithReferenceToNarrativeText
template.desc: Reusable template wherever a original text reference to the corresponding text in the human readable part (narrative text) is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_PersonNameInformationCompilation-eCH-0011
template.desc:
Person name information (with required family and given name) according to the eCH-0011 V8.1 nameData data type. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.
See https://www.ech.ch/vechweb/page?p=dossier&documentNumber=eCH-0011&documentVersion=8.1, section 3.3.2 nameData – Namensangaben for more information.

template.name: cdach_other_PlayingEntityCompilationWithName
template.desc: Reusable template wherever a playing entity with a required name is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.

template.name: cdach_other_TextElementWithReferenceToNarrativeText
template.desc: Reusable template wherever a original text reference to the corresponding text in the human readable part (narrative text) is used in a CDA-CH V2 document. CDA-CH V2 derivatives, i.e. Swiss exchange formats MAY use this template by either reference or specialisation.
